text: Subrata Mukherjee (14 August 1946 â€“ 4 November 2021) was an Indian politician. He was a member of All India Trinamool Congress. He also served as the 36th Mayor of Kolkata from 2000 to 2005. Mukherjee died at a Kolkata hospital from a heart attack on 4 November 2021, aged 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Trinamool Congress politicians
title: Subrata Mukherjee
